// Templar Test
// http://www.codechef.com/problems/KC205/

#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
#include <algorithm>
#include <vector>
#include <cmath>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	 int t;
	 scanf("%d",&t);
	 while(t--)
	 {
				  int n, m;
				  scanf("%d%d",&m,&n);
				  int c;
				  if(m % 2 != 0 && n % 2 != 0)
						 c = (n * m + 1) / 2;
				  else
						 c = n * m / 2;

					if(m == 2)
					{
						  c = n / 4 * 4 + 2 * (n % 4);
						  if(n % 4 == 3)c -= 2;
	 	  			}
	 	  			
	 	  			if(n == 2)
	 	  			{
						  c = m / 4 * 4 + 2 * (m % 4);
						  if(m % 4 == 3)c -= 2;
	 	  	  		}
	 	  	  		if(n == 1)c = m;
	 	  	  		if(m == 1)c = n;
	 	  	  		printf("%d\n", c);
  	 }
	
	 return 0;
}
